column2: FC Goa (also known as The Gaurs) is an Indian professional football franchise based in Goa that competes in the Indian Super League.
Mumbai City FC is an Indian professional football franchise based in Mumbai, Maharashtra, which competes in Indian Super League (ISL).
NorthEast United FC is an Indian professional football franchise based in Guwahati, Assam.
Kerala Blasters Football Club is an Indian professional football club based in Kochi, Kerala.
The Rising Pune Supergiant (often abbreviated as RPS) was a franchise cricket team based in Pune, Maharashtra, that played in the Indian Premier League in 2016 and 2017.
The Gujarat Lions (often abbreviated as GL) was a franchise cricket team based in the city of Rajkot, Gujarat, that represented Indian state Gujarat in the Indian Premier League.
An arsenal is a place where arms and ammunition are made, maintained and repaired, stored, or issued, in any combination, whether privately or publicly owned.
Mumbai Indians (abbreviated as MI) is a franchise cricket team representing the city of Mumbai, Maharashtra, in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
Chennaiyin FC (CFC) is an Indian Super League football club based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu.
The India national cricket team, also known as Team India and Men in Blue, represents India in international cricket.
The Chennai Super Kings (abbreviated as CSK) are a franchise cricket team based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu (India), which plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
